title: Different views, different sizes, and different prices we have it all!
posting_body: ['Woodland Trace', 'Located at: 1669 Iris Drive SE Conyers, GA 30013', 'Featured unit: 2 bed | 2 bath | 975 sq ft', 'Prices start at: $1580/month', 'Call Today!', 'show contact info', "The living spaces at Woodland Trace Atlanta are thoughtfully designed with comfort and convenience in mind, and are stylishly appointed with the kind of premium materials and finishes you won't find in any other apartments for rent in Conyers, GA.", "There's plenty of shopping, dining, outdoor activities and more near Woodland Trace Atlanta.", "You'll love living in the Conyers location!", 'Wonderful Amenities!', '➢ Business Center', '➢ Courtesy Patrol', '➢ Freeway Access', '➢ Front Door Trash Pickup', '➢ Porch', '➢ Short Term Lease', '➢ Smoke Free', '➢ Storage Space', '➢ Tennis Court', '➢ Valet Trash', '➢ 2 Community Playgrounds', '➢ 2 Sparkling Pools', '➢ Controlled Gated Access', '➢ Courtesy Patrol', '➢ Maintenance on site', '➢ Online Services', '➢ Package Service', '➢ Property Manager on Site', '➢ Public Transportation', '➢ Trash Pickup - Door to Door', 'Apartment Features!', '➢ Breakfast Bar', '➢ Cable Ready', '➢ Dining Room', '➢ Disposal', '➢ Oven/Range', '➢ Spacious Closets', '➢ Storage Units', '➢ Tub/Shower', '➢ Views', '➢ Window Coverings', '➢ Air Conditioning and Heating', '➢ Fireplaces in Select Units', '➢ Individual Climate Control', '➢ Newly Renovated with Black Appliances', '➢ Patios or Balconies in Select Units', '➢ Refrigerator/Freezer', '➢ Renovated Apartment Homes Available', '➢ Upgraded Flooring in Select Units', '➢ Washer/Dryer Hookup', '➢ Wheelchair Accessible (Rooms)', 'show contact info', 'Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM', 'Sat: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM', 'Sun: 1:00 PM - 5:00 PM', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Terms:', '12-Month', 'Pet Policy:', '$300 Pet Fee.', '$15 per month.', 'No aggressive breeds.', 'Prices are subject to change.', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '77AE677FD89C423E']
